mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id, name, type, path, component, perms, icon, sort_value, status, active_menu, is_hide FROM sys_menu ORDER BY sort_value ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu (parent_id, name, type, path, component, perms, icon, sort_value, status, active_menu, is_hide) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{path}, #{component}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{sortValue}, #{status}, #{activeMenu}, #{isHide})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, path = #{path}, component = #{component}, perms = #{perms}, icon = #{icon}, sort_value = #{sortValue}, status = #{status}, active_menu = #{activeMenu}, is_hide = #{isHide} WHERE id = #{id}
